extendedInfo.description: Ricky Monkey run throw jungle. He should avoid snakes, crocodiles and other obstacles on his way to win in this runner-game. But not everything is dangerous in jungle. Ricky Monkey loves fruits and you can help him to have it in this runner-game. Just collect any pair of fruits and Ricky will throw it to break obstacle. You can even collect not equals fruits for other bonuses. For example, it is fly on cloud to avoid any dangerous situations or you can find a treasure. Coins will help you to open new combos and upgrade them.Beat your maximum score in this runner-game and share it with your friends via facebook or twitter.Arts made by awesome artist Vicky Wenderlich.Enjoy the ride!
